name: Puzzle - Collect the color
description: I am glad to present you my next puzzle “Puzzle - Collect the color”. In this puzzle, you need to collect balls of the same color in each corner. To move the ball to the right place, click on it with the mouse. And without releasing the left button on the mouse, move the mouse pointer to the place where you want to move the ball. If you have a touch screen device, do the same with your finger. I would be grateful for donations that stimulate my creativity.
